name: Digital Herder Advertising Agency
tagline: Digital Marketing focused on ROI. More customers.
description: Digital Herder is a full-service digital marketing company with locations in New York and New Jersey. Our digital advertising campaigns are focused on ROI. You can also hire Digital Marketing Project Managers to manage your entire marketing department, your current vendors, and offer digital strategy consultations on: SEO, SEM, PPC, Content, and more.
